website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a cake ring you can adjust to several sizes, this is a good-quality option.
pros: This is a single ring which can adjust between 6 and 12 inches in diameter
Helps you get a professional finish
cons: The handles that make this mold adjustable also prevent it from being used as a cutter

customer_reviews.title: Holds desired size well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a milk bar birthday cake and it was perfect! It cuts through the sheet cake well and holds its place when at the desired size of ring. I used at 6 in. Easy to clean and store. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Wadkins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product for Sharp Edged Cakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item specifically for trying out the masking technique for cakes and am absolutely delighted that you can adjust it so easily. I was worried that when I adjust the diameter for bigger cakes the circle might not be accurately round. But, I never had a problem at all and easily masked a seven inch and 10 inch cake and the clear and sharp edges speak for themselves. Don’t forget to use acetate sheets inside of the cake ring. I’m chuffed it works so well for taller cakes as well when used with acetate sheets. Highly recommend it for its ease of use and hassle free cleaning and adjusting the diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Zhill

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’m new to making cakes using a sheet cake and then cutting out with the ring but I wanted to try something different. So I decided to make a Momofuku cake and needed this ring. The cake turned out awesome and the mold ring worked perfectly. The ring seems to be high quality and nicely made. It was easy to adjust, easy to use to stamp out the cake and it cleaned easily in the dishwasher. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This works good but it ships coiled in it's smallest form so when you spread it out, in inside parts rolls inward so you have to tape the top and bottom to keep it from cutting inward into the cake. This is the cake I made using it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Perry

customer_reviews.title: Regular steel NOT STAINLESS STEEL
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money!!! I don't know how anyone had anything good to say about this product!! It's not stainless steel, not even cheap stainless steel. This is regular steel and not "seem-less" by any means. It has two huge seems.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Shute

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Baking sourdough bread, I wanted a loftier loaf. I can let the loaf Rise in the form on a trimmed parchment sheet then transfer to a hot stone. At this point, you chose to bake with or without a ring. Through the dishwasher and store till next time. I recommend storing in the original box and placing flat. Not on the round sides. A lot less chance of deformation. Just the item I was looking for and they are stainless steel, no rust issues.
customer_reviews.author: ChasD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and adjust cake ring
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use cake ring. Used it to make a layered ice cream cake. It was easy to use and not to thick on the stainless still easy to get it to release from the cake with just a quick swip of a warm rag. It comes in a small box and was worried it wouldn't be big enough but it sizes to fit a cake as described on the packaging and everything in between. Easy to clean since it is all staineless steel.
customer_reviews.author: TheBlueGrassCat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing results
customer_reviews.text: We tried making a cake with this mold. I've seen it (or one like it) used online. So, we adjusted the size, set it on a tray with a silicone mat . Poured the box mix, and everything seemed ok. But 5-10 min in, there was a large pool of cake mix spilling and burning on the sides. After cleaning the mess, I could see that the mold won't make a seal or contact with the pad because of the clips that allow for the adjustment. You can see the light coming thru on one of my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Leaking problem
customer_reviews.text: When I use this to bake cake. It’s leaking like crazy as there is no bottom. It ruined my cake! You can only use this to cut your cake not baking it. The video is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Big

customer_reviews.title: Minimum 6.25", not 6", and doesn't hold its size well
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, in spite of the description, the minimum size is actually 6.25" instead of 6". (If you don't need a 6" ring, then this problem would not necessarily be relevant to you!) The little sliding metal bar that holds the ring to its adjusted size also was very loose, so that it didn't hold anything. I can picture how one might use pliers to bend the ends of the clips more snugly to the ring, so that it actually holds its size (or, you could just use binder clips around the top, probably), but since the size is wrong for me anyway, I did not bother with these hacks.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a 12" 3 mousse cake. I thought it wasn't going to extend wide enough to go around the 12" cake, but it proved me wrong. The ring was wide enough for the cake, it stayed in place the entire time. It's easy to clean. It can also be seperated and put back into place. I measure the height with a ruler it was only 3" high.
customer_reviews.author: M.H

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I make fancy European cakes as a hobby and often give them as a hostess gift. This cake ring really helps me build my layered cakes nice and straight for a very professional look.
customer_reviews.author: G. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional bakers
customer_reviews.text: This product is great if you want flexibility in your cake sizes without having to purchase multiple rings. The downsides are that it can be sort of tricky to get it all clean because of the overlapping parts and somewhat sharp edges, and you can't use it to cut layers from a sheet cake because of the handle/grips. Good for budget bakers or people with limited space, but if you plan to use it a lot, splurge for individual rings.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good size adjust founction
customer_reviews.text: Very perfect function,save my space and money. I can make different size now~
customer_reviews.author: sina xu

customer_reviews.title: Works well at first but can't stay fixed
customer_reviews.text: It was so good at first. The material is thick. Easy to use. It helps me save money by buying only one instead of a few in different sizes. And helps save space to. However, after a short time (about a month or two), the ring fails to stay at its minimum 6 inch. I have to fix it by tying some rubber bands around the handle. Also the clips are very loose. Seems like not very long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Thuong Ngo

customer_reviews.title: thiner and smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: it looks solid but it is thinner then I expected it. Lighter than I expected as well. My wife told me wish it would be built more sturdy, but other than that everything works fine on it.
customer_reviews.author: Thien D.

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but not the best design
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this ring is good. I don’t need to buy too many sizes of rings. But when I used this for my mousse. It leaked a little bit on the bottom. Because the extension on the ring is different height then the ring it makes it pop up a little. So it leaked. And one more thing I gave 3 stars is. When u stretch it out to make it bigger or make it smaller. It doesn’t tell u what size Ur getting. So u have to guess or really measure the ring to get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: sze ngai

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not that easy to clean but it’s amazing, maybe should add a silicone bottom to the ring so nothing will leak outside
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Not just for baking.. I use it for clay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hand building with clay, I like that it’s adjustable with markings. The larger you expand it, the the less it stays in place so you have to hold it in place, but that’s ok, it’s strong and I love it...I would buy a smaller version of it. It’s easy enough to clean and it’s durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Not for baking
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to bake a cake but it’s leaking as it doesn’t have bottom. Part of my cake was on the baking sheet. Probably it’s good for mousse cake or cheesecake but not for baking. Also doesn’t hold the size properly.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cake ring to make my Milk bar birthday cake. I love that the ring starts at 6inches and can be adjusted to even bigger sizes. It's easy to clean. However I try to be very careful when handling it because the edges of the ring are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Imbert

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Well, I just started using the ring mold, I don’t know how long it’ll last, but it looks pretty durable. The edges are sharp, so you do have to be careful when you’re cleaning it. As for performance, the mold ring isnok. My complain would be the metal clip that they use to hold the size is not that good. The clip is kinda loose and sometimes when I try to move the mold ring, it doesn’t stay in shape. My 2nd complain is the shape of the mold ring, it’s slightly oval in shape, not 100% round.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be adjusted
customer_reviews.text: The ring is supposed be able to adjust in sizes. But it’s only a perfect circle at 6 inches because it always rests at 6 inches. So when you try to make it bigger, the ring turns shape.
customer_reviews.author: Hada

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first foray into using a cake ring, and this adjustable guy was just perfect! It adjusts very easily but also stays in place once adjusted to the desired size. I lined mine with acetate and made a naked layered cake using it for my husband's birthday. Despite my assembly being a little sloppy, the cake ring held everything into a perfect upright shape. Very happy with this purchase and would recommend to others who are beginning to play around with layered desserts!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrin Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Making a Tosi cake? Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I made a Milkbar cake recently and if you've seen a recipe for one you know a cake ring is an absolute must! and this served my purpose well. As other's have mentioned cleaning the in-between a tad bit hard but nothing that be take down with spray from kitchen faucet. Also, it is barter since you get have three ring sizes in one.
customer_reviews.author: Aradhana Lakshman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a HUGE pie crust cutter!
customer_reviews.text: I roll & cut hundreds of pie crusts every week, and I kept thinking there HAD to be an easier way. Like a large cookie cutter for cutting out pie crusts. I make several different sizes, so I've marked the spot where each size should be. The only thing I did different was I'm using small binder clip to keep it firmly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday and I was so happy to use it. But then I saw that it wasn't flat but I said to myself it's gonna work. I was wrong. Ma cake was leaking. Next time, I'll put parchment paper inside the ring. When I checked the package, I saw on the box, a photo where they put aluminum foil around it so I know it's not a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust to different widths, got the job done. Had no trouble using this ring, used it with a cake collar to make a taller 8" wide mousse cake.
customer_reviews.author: Anamika

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - could be better
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I didn't love this product is because the edges are so sharp and unfinished almost. You can really cut yourself if you're not careful, they're not rounded. Also, I thought being able to adjust the size would be really useful, but once you start to expand, it kind of loses it shape and rigidity.
customer_reviews.author: ek

customer_reviews.title: Be careful that the sharp edge will cut your finger ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful that the sharp edge will cut your finger. I used it to make mousse cake a couple of times, but it did hurt my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: oncidium Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: came dirty
customer_reviews.text: when i received it the logo was almost completely worn away and the product was covered in brown stuff, i ordered a replacement and it was the same.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: not 6 inches
customer_reviews.text: this is a great tool to cut cakes. But it does not go to 6 inches, its smallest setting is 6 1/2. so it didnt cut two nice circles from my 9 x 13 pan.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Frohman

customer_reviews.title: NOTE THIS IS 6.25" MIN. - Quality Cake Ring, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Important to note this is 6.25" (min) in diameter. I thought it was 6" (per the listing headline) and luckily got it in advance to purchase a larger cake pan that would fit (2) 6.25" round cutouts. The ring itself it durable and sturdy, made of quality steel. Cleans up easily. Like the tall profile of this (vs. the true 6" ring I have that is only 2" tall).
customer_reviews.author: K. Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Works well and you don't have to stock up molds anymore
customer_reviews.text: I use it for dessert mousse. It works well. I didn't use it for baking though
customer_reviews.author: Icela

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy, and very thoughtfully made. So happy to have a one-and-done tool that replaces my need for multiple sized cake rings.
customer_reviews.author: MsFancyPantz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and adjustable to exactly match cake size. This was the 1st time I've attempted to make a cake like this and as you can see in my photo, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ring mold! It is sharp enough to use as a cookie cutter too. :) I'll be using this to make medovik!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Verry bad
customer_reviews.text: This have a gap at bottom because the things to hold it, that's why my cake look dirty and ugly after I took my cake out of the oven. It's hard to clean also because of the same stupid things
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Milk Bar layer cakes
customer_reviews.text: Works great, got it for trying out Christina Tosi’s Milk Bar layer cake recipes. Acetate did get stuck on the tab, so be mindful of how the acetate gets placed or else your cake won’t come off cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the inexperienced bakers.
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use it, because the batter just came out from under it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is horribly constructed. It wouldn’t form a true circle and it wouldn’t stay in the expanded position.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Cade Stainless Steel 6 to12 Inch
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use noting special simple product Just use by chooses size and adjustable Better then others stuff i have before The best way i do at the bottom I line with baking paper perfect for me ok
customer_reviews.author: Wojtek

customer_reviews.title: Not to my liking
customer_reviews.text: The ring wouldn’t stay secure,the inner part is cutting in your cake
customer_reviews.author: Polina Martinyuk

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, easy to use and firmed “didn’t move or change the determined size” Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Heba

customer_reviews.title: smart kitchen collection
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to handle with adjustable size and ocupy less space. I have used it for making cheese cake and for regular baking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I did so many beautiful plates with it! Very well made and easy to use👌
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: You need one if you make cakes a lot
customer_reviews.text: Only if it could 1cm more smaller but overall it works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient cake making tool
customer_reviews.text: Made my very first cake with this tool. Overall easy to use and easy to clean. Pretty solid stainless steel. The only thing I had difficulty is the measurement unit being centimeters I guess. I expect it to be inches while it says 6 to 12 inch. But not too big of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cake mold
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a mousse mold ring and this product made it a piece of cake! (pardon the pun) It adjusted very easily and was made for a very simple cake removal. I hand washed it and it was very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M Court

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSS
customer_reviews.text: WHERE HAS THIS BEEN ALL MY LIFEEEEE. I would have cabinets and shelves filled with cake rings in different sizes and now all I need is this one!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing I disliked. Surprisingly easy to use and the cake looked perfect in shape. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Maedl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Easy to change the size. Perfect for no bake cakes! Takeing our the cake is effortless
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a special birthday cake I was making and it was easy to use and got to job done, also the quality was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: thues

customer_reviews.title: Adjustability is ideal for the home baker.
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel makes it easy to clean and I like the adjustable factor. Works beautifully and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I had only used it once for a no-bake gelatin cake. It rusted over night and gave my cake a strange grey/purple color on the sides. It's supposed to be stainless steel and I don't believe it's supposed to do that... I don't have pictures because I actually unintentionally threw it away which I would have done anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a Momofuku Milk Bar cake for my daughter's birthday. Worked great, was easy to remove once the cake was assembled, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Muisjes Sneppok

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful layered cakes
customer_reviews.text: This did a great job in making a chocolate mousse cake - I can't wait to try it on an ice cream cake!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Donna  Roche

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but doesn't work that well in practice. Because it is adjustable, it is not completely round.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Has rust spots on it
customer_reviews.text: The one I received has rust spots on it... I bought it for my friend and my friend was trying to remove them but still couldn’t remove all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cake Ring!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very easy to use and clean. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Portnov

customer_reviews.title: Great Peoduct
customer_reviews.text: I really only use it to cut out perfect circles out of sheet cakes ... it’s an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This ring is adjustable, and slides easily to each position. You cannot extend it all the way or the shape will become distorted, but is a good buy for the price. I use this for “milk bar” type cakes, and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. schleifer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift and part of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and part of a larger order of baking equipment for my wife. Since my only contribution to her baking hobby is eating the results I can only say the end result was a completely satisfactory experience.
customer_reviews.author: consultant_at_large

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Great idea
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. I like the idea that you can adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: AWRR.4

customer_reviews.title: 👎 bad product
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero star if I could, its flimsy product and my cake's batter leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jiji

customer_reviews.title: Great for making cakes
customer_reviews.text: I love this adjustable ring for cakes! Makes it so Mach easier to make a cake of any size! And it saves a lot of room in your cabinet because you don’t need rings of different sizes and can have just this adjustable one!
customer_reviews.author: Kseniya

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Prompt Delivery and Just what I needed to make Watermelon Cakes for backyard BBQ's . works great !
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/ bake/ clean
customer_reviews.text: I used this to bake Christmas plum cakes and they worked like a charm. I didn't have any problem while using it. You can use it for baking like the other cake rings by sealing it with a tin foil underneath. Innovative design and best for storage since you do not have to buy additional cake rings of different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cake-maker's best tool!
customer_reviews.text: If you bake , you must have it!! I totally love it! Very well made, easy to set needed size, good clips. Absolutely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Leka G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but..
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have bottom. I'm a beginner of baking cakes so I didn't know what exactly it is. You should know it's not a cake pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: It's well made, very good quality and should last a long time. I use it to cut circles of clay for ceramics. I love not having to have multiple tools for this process, I can make one or many of any size up to the limitations of the ring.
customer_reviews.author: s thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This ring worked well. Result is a beautiful mousse cake.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L.

customer_reviews.text: Mine doesn’t come with the measurement indentations inside the ring. And it also doesn’t have the logo that’s pictured on the product. I noticed everybody who posted a picture of what they received had all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Camarce

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great! I didn't really know how to keep the adjustment in place, so I just used a rubber band to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: XingYi C.

customer_reviews.title: its adjustable no need to buy additional rings.
customer_reviews.text: Product was better than expected. High quality. It will last forever. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Wendling

customer_reviews.title: Functional, adjustable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The height is just what I need. Fun to use when unveiling a beautiful cake.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & Spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that has been amazing in making several tiered cakes without a pile of different rings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Could be better if it could stay open by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S

customer_reviews.title: Walls are not adjacent to each other
customer_reviews.text: poor quality. when the ring expands, the walls are not adjacent to each other. it is completely unsuitable for baking. the ring gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Saw this cake ring in Germany and then was told I could order it on amazon. It's exactly the same one and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Elfie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time when I was making a Garash Cake and have used it many times since.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Product rusts after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Both rusted within 3 months after a less than 5 uses. Worst part is there seems to be no way to action on any warranty. Recommend avoiding.
customer_reviews.author: james cogan

customer_reviews.title: In a pinch it works ok.
customer_reviews.text: If you need an entry level adjustable cake ring, this is one to consider....however, the fastener to hold the ring in place is loose and the ‘handles’ make cutting your cake sloppy since they produde out. In a pinch, it works ok.
customer_reviews.author: LMR

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy, not top quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy or as high quality as I thought. Be careful as there is potential to cut oneself.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Rusty on first wash
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this week and it got rusty on the first wash. The product details said it’s stainless steel. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ayelet Triky

customer_reviews.title: hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to control the size and It's a little rusty.
customer_reviews.author: Yunuo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making naked cakes. That's why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne F.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product because it would no hold the product and would leak from the adjustable side
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used it to make a layered holiday salad. Came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana K.

customer_reviews.title: It leaks, and it's not easy to fully wash it clean
customer_reviews.text: It leaks, and it's not easy to fully wash it clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performed as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to help form a Black Forest Cake. It helped build the layers and keep them until ready to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Alice A. Judd

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cake ring! It’s affordable and super flexible so I don’t have to buy multiple rings to do different size cakes and I don’t have a lot of space in my kitchen so it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Mentzer

customer_reviews.title: Cool item but with 2 flaws
customer_reviews.text: Really like this item and I ordered a total of 4. I used these for my basic buttercream cakes being covered with Fondant. However, when using a torch to unmold I’ve noticed 2 flaws. The handles get too hot to touch and it leaves indents on the Cakes. Really hope they improve on those issues.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product the only problem I had was releasing it from the cake, otherwise it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Maida-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The cake ring is perfect as it is infinitely adjustable within its range. The marks indicating the size of a particular adjustment are hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: DrVic

customer_reviews.title: Finally bought what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Because it can be adjusted, it is easy to open without damaging the cake !!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Liu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Having one form that can be set to multiple sizes is awesome! Gets me everything I need, without filling up cabinet space to store it- pure Genius ;)
customer_reviews.author: Antonina Shevchenko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I work doing cakes and this mould was perfect, I just don’t need to have lots of different sizes of molds just to do my stuff, this one just solved one big space problem. I just wish they were 4 inches high.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Coimbra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to use and storage
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two cake rings from Cade. The product is excellent, very easy to use and to store. The shipping was very fast without any issues. I would certainly recommend others to buy the product from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy O'Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Used to assemble my nieces vegan wedding cake. So glad I had it to keep the layers from sliding!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: Cade Stainless Steel 6 to12 Inch Adjustable Cake Mousse Mould Cake Baking Cake Decor Mold Ring
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1Adust and Space-saver
This is a single ring which you can adjust between 6" to 12" in diameter. Slightly higher than 3" in depth. Clear edges. Adjusts accurately. Cleans in dishwasher. Help you get a professional finish. Straight edges.

Food Safe Material
Made offood grade, Strong and durable stainless steel material for safe food contact applications. Construction is solid and durable.Can be used at temperatures below 1500 °F
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY: This baking supplies used sturdy stainless steel. High temperature, corrosion-resistant, not easily deformed, reusable, easy to clean.
ADJUSTABLE: This Cake Mold can be adjusted from 6.25 ~ 12 inches, height: 3.2 inch. And there are different number carved on this cake server, so you can make the correct size you want.
MULTI-PURPOSE: suitable for making mousse cake, baking cake, bread, biscuits, biscuits, chocolate or other.
WARM TIPS: When you ajust the size or wash the product, please don't put your hand on the edge of the cake mold.
Our Service: Replace or Full refund if dissatisfied. Any before or after sale problems will be replied within 12 hours.
